content: almagre by chelsey clammer a hat with ridges as majestic as almagre mountain outside of colorado springs when my mother first saw this hat she said it looks like mountain ranges well almagre mountain was the first mountain she climbed so this one is for you mom materials 180 yards worsted yarn 16 circular needle us size 7 16 circular needle us size 8 us size 8 dpns one stitch marker yarn needle gauge 8 stitches = 2 14 row = 2 sizes the directions for this hat are for an adult size small 21 circumference if you need to make a larger one cast on 104 stitches or any multiple of 8 and do 6 pattern repeats then row 14 17 again before the crown shaping a note about yarn weight the first time i made this hat i used red heart worsted yarn and it only took 4 pattern repeats the second time i did it i used lion brand pound of love worsted for the second hat i had to do 5 pattern repeats instead of 4 because the yarn was thinner even though it was worsted yarn when you make the hat if you are at 7 inches at the end of 4 pattern repeats then begin crown shaping if you re not quite at 7 inches then do another pattern repeat before crown shaping abbreviations pm place marker k knit p purl k2tog knit two together ssk slip-slip-knit slip two stitches knit-wise one at a time put back on left needle then knit through the back loops of the two stitches together rt right twist knit two stitches together but leave on left needles then knit through the front of the first stitch and slip both stitches onto the right needle lt left twist skip the first stitch and knit into the back loop of the second stitch on the left needle keep the stitch on the left needle and knit into the back loop of both the first and the second stitches knit both stitches of the needle and onto the right needle * * repeat the directions inside the asterisks special note on row 19 of the pattern know that you will remove the marker knit a rt then replace the marker right where it was when you removed it this will get the pattern to continue to twist to the right through each round directions with smaller needles us size 7 co 88 stitches pm and join to knit in the round careful not to twist brim row 1 *k3 p1* row 2 p1 *k1 p3* k1 p2 row 3 12 repeat row 1 2 until brim is 1 5 long almagre hat pattern switch to larger needles us size 8 row 13 *knit* row 14 *lt k2 lt rt* row 15 *knit* row 16 k1 *lt k2 rt k2* until last 7 stitches then lt k2 rt k1 row 17 *knit* row 18 *rt lt rt k2* row 19 knit until
